events.message: Update btcdrak key with new expiry dates

events.body: I think my key in the repo expired as well... We might ask people to just refresh the keys from a keyserver.

On the other hand, the key servers are a sewer, people should be careful not to request keys by 32-bit key-id anymore at least. So if we're going to ask people to refresh from there, we should provide the right commands.

``` sh
gpg --import bitcoin/contrib/gitian-keys/*.pgp
gpg --refresh-keys
```

It should not request by 32-bit id, when you import from the repo.
I didn't even know about --refresh-keys. Let's add that to `doc/release-process.md`.

issue.title: Update gitian signing key of jl2012
